title: Phone speaker not working properly
content: My mobile phones speaker volume went soo down that i need to keep the speaker next to my ears to listen to music... And Most of the time in a call the people on other side can't hear... I need to turn the speaker while on a call. I'm tpp fed up ... Please do resolve my problem üôè
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
